ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Durability and grant the ally who has dealt the most damage this round <scaleLevel>@AttackSpeed@%</scaleLevel> Attack Speed, decaying over @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Dangerous Mutations
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>? (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Durability and grant the ally who has dealt the most damage this round <scaleLevel>100 / 120 / 160%</scaleLevel> Attack Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.

ability.desc: Fire a pair of missiles at target. Allies they pass through gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. When they collide, they deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedExplosionDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Loyalty Program
ability.description: Fire a pair of missiles at target. Allies they pass through gain <TFTBonus>95 / 120 / 150 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 3 seconds. When they collide, they deal <magicDamage>280 / 420 / 650 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to target and <magicDamage>140 / 210 / 325 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.

ability.desc: Throw a canister at target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to them and releasing <scaleLevel>@MinionsSpawned@</scaleLevel> monstrosities. Monstrosities attack @MinionNumAttacks@ times and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedMinionDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage per attack.
ability.name: Canned Monstrosity
ability.description: Throw a canister at target, dealing <magicDamage>100 / 200 / 1000 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to them and releasing <scaleLevel>4 / 4 / 8</scaleLevel> monstrosities. Monstrosities attack 5 times and deal <magicDamage>38 / 57 / 100 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage per attack.

ability.desc:
Kick the target, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) Adaptive Damage. Heal for @HealPercent*100@% of the damage dealt.

Adaptive Damage: Uses the damage type the target resists less
ability.name: Adaptive Strike
ability.description:
Kick the target, dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) Adaptive Damage. Heal for 40% of the damage dealt.

Adaptive Damage: Uses the damage type the target resists less

ability.desc:
Passive: After surviving damage, deal @PassiveDamagePercent*100@% of the damage absorbed as magic damage to target.

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Shock the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies for @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and reduce their damage by @DamageReduction*100@% for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Static Field
ability.description:
Passive: After surviving damage, deal 2% of the damage absorbed as magic damage to target.

Active: Gain 450 / 470 / 520 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Shock the nearest 3 enemies for 40 / 60 / 100 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and reduce their damage by 10% for 4 seconds.

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, then Stun target for @StunDuration@ seconds. Slam them down, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to them and causing a shockwave in their row. Enemies hit take <physicalDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and are briefly knocked up.
ability.name: Wrecking Crew
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>250 / 300 / 1200 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 3 seconds, then Stun target for 1 seconds. Slam them down, dealing <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to them and causing a shockwave in their row. Enemies hit take <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and are briefly knocked up.

ability.desc:
Enter a sniper's stance and call in an airship that circles the battlefield for @RaidDuration@ seconds, dropping @TotalShots@ bombs at a random cluster of enemies over the duration. Bombs deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD% %i:scaleAP%) physical damage in a one-hex circle.

Whenever an enemy is caught in the epicenter of an Air Raid blast, reduce their Armor and Magic Resist by @ResistReduction@ and fire a shot towards them, dealing @HeadshotDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
ability.name: Air Raid
ability.description:
Enter a sniper's stance and call in an airship that circles the battlefield for 5 seconds, dropping ? bombs at a random cluster of enemies over the duration. Bombs deal ? (%i:scaleAD% %i:scaleAP%) physical damage in a one-hex circle.

Whenever an enemy is caught in the epicenter of an Air Raid blast, reduce their Armor and Magic Resist by 20 and fire a shot towards them, dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

ability.desc: Summon an assault of afterimages that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to <scaleLevel>@NumBonusEnemies@</scaleLevel> other nearby enemies. Afterimages reduce their target's Magic Resist by @ShredAmount@ for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Splitting Seconds
ability.description: Summon an assault of afterimages that deals <magicDamage>? (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and <magicDamage>145 / 215 / 450 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to <scaleLevel>2 / 2 / 4</scaleLevel> other nearby enemies. Afterimages reduce their target's Magic Resist by 5 for the rest of combat.

ability.desc: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Reduce all incoming damage by <scaleLevel>@FlatDamageReduction@</scaleLevel>. Every second, emit sparks that deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Obsolete Technology
ability.description: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Reduce all incoming damage by <scaleLevel>12 / 15 / 25</scaleLevel>. Every second, emit sparks that deal <magicDamage>10 / 15 / 25 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.

ability.desc:
Summon a gate in a 5-hex line across target. Enemies hit take @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and are 20% Shredded for @ShredDuration@ seconds. Malzahar spreads 5 stacks of infection between enemies hit.

Infection deals @ModifiedInfectionDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per second for the rest of combat. This effect can stack infinitely. When an infected target dies, they spread their stacks to nearby enemies.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
ability.name: Call of the Machine
ability.description:
Summon a gate in a 5-hex line across target. Enemies hit take 80 / 120 / 1000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and are 20% Shredded for 4 seconds. Malzahar spreads 5 stacks of infection between enemies hit.

Infection deals 18 / 27 / 400 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per second for the rest of combat. This effect can stack infinitely. When an infected target dies, they spread their stacks to nearby enemies.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

ability.desc:
Become energized and heal @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) over @Duration@ seconds. While energized, deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to a nearby enemy each second. Afterwards, deal @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%) magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

Experiment Bonus: Gain @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_DrMundoBaseHealthExperimentBonus@ max Health. On takedown, gain @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_DrMundoCurrentExperimentBonus@ max Health for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Maximum Dosage
ability.description:
Become energized and heal ? (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) over 2 seconds. While energized, deal ? (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to a nearby enemy each second. Afterwards, deal ? (%i:scaleHealth%) magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

Experiment Bonus: Gain ? max Health. On takedown, gain ? max Health for the rest of combat.

ability.desc:
For the next @TotalAttacks@ attacks, gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed, infinite range, and replace attacks with a piercing bolt that targets random enemies. Bolts deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage, reduced by @DamageReduction*100@% for each enemy they pass through.

Experiment Bonus: After every @ExperimentDamageTicks@ attacks, deal physical damage to the nearest enemy equal to @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_TwitchCurrentExperimentBonus@% of their max Health.
ability.name: Spray and Pray
ability.description:
For the next ? attacks, gain 85% Attack Speed, infinite range, and replace attacks with a piercing bolt that targets random enemies. Bolts deal ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage, reduced by 40 / 40 / 20% for each enemy they pass through.

Experiment Bonus: After every 5 attacks, deal physical damage to the nearest enemy equal to ?% of their max Health.

ability.desc: Throw a shuriken at target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and marking them to take <TFTBonus>@TargetDamageAmp*100@%</TFTBonus> more damage for @Duration@ seconds. Then dash away from target. After a brief delay, dash towards them and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Shuriken Flip
ability.description: Throw a shuriken at target, dealing <magicDamage>80 / 120 / 185 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and marking them to take <TFTBonus>15%</TFTBonus> more damage for 4 seconds. Then dash away from target. After a brief delay, dash towards them and deal <magicDamage>240 / 360 / 600 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.desc:
Pull in an enemy on either side and slam them together, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

If only one enemy is grabbed, the damage and Stun duration are increased by 50%.
ability.name: Facebreaker
ability.description:
Pull in an enemy on either side and slam them together, dealing 180 / 270 / 420 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stunning them for 1 / 1 / 2 seconds.

If only one enemy is grabbed, the damage and Stun duration are increased by 50%.

ability.desc: Fire a shot towards current target that deals @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to all enemies within 1 hex. Then, deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the unit in the center of the blast.
ability.name: Essence Flux
ability.description: Fire a shot towards current target that deals ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to all enemies within 1 hex. Then, deal ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the unit in the center of the blast.

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@DR*100@%</TFTBonus> Durability for @SpellDuration@ seconds. Over the duration, drain <trueDamage>@ModifiedHealthSteal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</trueDamage> Health from the nearest <scaleLevel>@NumEnemies@</scaleLevel> enemies. Then slam down, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.
ability.name: Test of Spirit
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>50 / 50 / 89%</TFTBonus> Durability for 3 seconds. Over the duration, drain <trueDamage>50 / 75 / 225 (%i:scaleAP%)</trueDamage> Health from the nearest <scaleLevel>4 / 4 / 10</scaleLevel> enemies. Then slam down, dealing <magicDamage>? (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

ability.desc:
Passive: If Draven has an empowered axe in hand, it replaces his next attack, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Empowered axes return to Draven after hitting an enemy.

Active: Spin an empowered axe.
ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description:
Passive: If Draven has an empowered axe in hand, it replaces his next attack, dealing 10 / 15 / 25 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Empowered axes return to Draven after hitting an enemy.

Active: Spin an empowered axe.

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Lance enemies in a line for <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and steal <TFTBonus>@DefensesSteal@</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist from enemies hit.
ability.name: Shattering Strike
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>300 / 350 / 400 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 4 seconds. Lance enemies in a line for <magicDamage>? (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and steal <TFTBonus>10 / 12 / 15</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist from enemies hit.

ability.desc: Blast target for <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Every third cast, splash miasma to @BonusNumEnemies@ enemies within @HexRadius@ hexes, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedMiasmaDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to each.
ability.name: Thorned Miasma
ability.description: Blast target for <magicDamage>230 / 345 / 550 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Every third cast, splash miasma to 2 enemies within 3 hexes, dealing <magicDamage>160 / 240 / 385 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to each.

ability.desc: Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target.
ability.name: Transfusion
ability.description: Heal <scaleHealth>200 / 240 / 300 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and deal <magicDamage>140 / 210 / 325 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target.

ability.desc: Jump to a nearby hex and web all enemies within @HexRadius@ hexes, Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds and dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>.
ability.name: Cocoon
ability.description: Jump to a nearby hex and web all enemies within 2 hexes, Stunning them for 1 / 2 / 8 seconds and dealing <magicDamage>120 / 180 / 1200 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Heal <scaleHealth>? (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>.

ability.desc:
Chain together the nearest @ChainTargets@ enemies for @ChainDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between them. When one takes damage, @DamageShare*100@% of the amount is split as bonus true damage to the others.

LeBlanc's next @NumAttacks@ attacks deal @ModifiedAutoDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage, increased by @AutoKillBonus*100@% for each enemy killed by the initial damage.
ability.name: The Chains of Fate
ability.description:
Chain together the nearest 4 / 4 / 20 enemies for 5 seconds, dealing 650 / 975 / 5000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between them. When one takes damage, 18 / 25 / 100% of the amount is split as bonus true damage to the others.

LeBlanc's next 3 attacks deal 160 / 240 / 900 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage, increased by 50% for each enemy killed by the initial damage.

ability.desc: Fire <scaleLevel>@StartingRockets@</scaleLevel> missiles at random enemies that deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Each cast fires @MissileIncreasePerCast@ more missile than the last.
ability.name: PROGRESSSSS!
ability.description: Fire <scaleLevel>5 / 5 / 7</scaleLevel> missiles at random enemies that deal <magicDamage>54 / 81 / 270 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. Each cast fires 1 more missile than the last.

ability.desc:
Passive: Summon a placeable Hextech Forge. On cast, the @NumAlliesShield@ allies closest to it gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. If it's dead, revive it with @ReducedSummonHealth*100@% Health.

Active: Summon 2 Hexgates and knock target into one of them, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and sending them flying back to their original position. While flying, they deal @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to all other enemies in the path.
ability.name: Special Delivery
ability.description:
Passive: Summon a placeable Hextech Forge. On cast, the 3 allies closest to it gain 200 / 275 / 1800 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. If it's dead, revive it with 100% Health.

Active: Summon 2 Hexgates and knock target into one of them, dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and sending them flying back to their original position. While flying, they deal ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to all other enemies in the path.

ability.desc: Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and chomp target for <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. Both effects are increased by up to @AmountIncreaseMax*100@% based on Trundle's missing Health.
ability.name: Desperate Chomp
ability.description: Heal <scaleHealth>? (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and chomp target for <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. Both effects are increased by up to 75% based on Trundle's missing Health.

ability.desc: Toss a bomb at target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedInitialDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. @NumBombs@ mini-bombs fly out, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to random enemies.
ability.name: Bomb Full of Bombs
ability.description: Toss a bomb at target, dealing <magicDamage>? (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. 3 mini-bombs fly out, dealing <magicDamage>? (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to random enemies.

ability.desc:
Call down a rain of @NumMissile@ missiles on target's row that each deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, Wound, and 1% Burn units hit for @WoundDuration@ seconds. For each missile that doesn't hit an enemy, restore @ManaPerMissile@ Mana.

If there's only 1 enemy left, fire all of the missiles at them.

Burn: Deal a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_JunkerKing_UpgradeTRAKeyWrapper@
ability.name: The Equalizer
ability.description:
Call down a rain of 5 missiles on target's row that each deal 500 / 750 / 4000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, Wound, and 1% Burn units hit for 5 seconds. For each missile that doesn't hit an enemy, restore 20 Mana.

If there's only 1 enemy left, fire all of the missiles at them.

Burn: Deal a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

ability.desc: Leap towards the enemy with the fewest items within @LeapHexRange@ hexes. Slash @BaseNumStabs@ times, dealing a total of <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. If they die, leap again, dealing @DamageReductionOnLeap*100@% less damage.
ability.name: Scrap Hacker
ability.description: Leap towards the enemy with the fewest items within 4 hexes. Slash 3 times, dealing a total of <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. If they die, leap again, dealing 30% less damage.

ability.desc:
Randomly cast 1 of 3 spells, with a chance of a Jackpot!

Flamethrower: {{Spell_TFT13_LieutenantSpell1_Tooltip}}

Extendo-Punch: {{Spell_TFT13_LieutenantSpell2_Tooltip}}

Chomp: {{Spell_TFT13_LieutenantSpell3_Tooltip}}

ability.description:
Randomly cast 1 of 3 spells, with a chance of a Jackpot!

ability.desc: Heal @ModifiedHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) over @StunDuration@ seconds. For the duration, raise target into the air, Stunning them, and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Afterwards, slam them down, dealing @FinalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to all adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Sludgerunner's Smash
ability.description: Heal ? (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) over 1 seconds. For the duration, raise target into the air, Stunning them, and dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Afterwards, slam them down, dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to all adjacent enemies.

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds. It redirects <TFTBonus>@PercentDamageRedirect*100@%</TFTBonus> of damage taken by adjacent allies. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a cone.
ability.name: Piltover Bulwark
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>500 / 575 / 675 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 4 seconds. It redirects <TFTBonus>50%</TFTBonus> of damage taken by adjacent allies. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>150 / 225 / 360 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a cone.

ability.desc:
Passive: On heal, heal the @NumAlliesToShare@ closest allies for @PercentAlliedHealShare*100@% of the amount.

Active: Heal for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) and strike target for @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
ability.name: Field Medicine
ability.description:
Passive: On heal, heal the 2 closest allies for 25% of the amount.

Active: Heal for 270 / 310 / 360 (%i:scaleAP%) and strike target for 260 / 390 / 585 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

ability.desc: Fire @NumOfShots@ shots towards the farthest enemy that deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the first enemy they hit.
ability.name: Fan the Hammer
ability.description: Fire 6 shots towards the farthest enemy that deal <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the first enemy they hit.

ability.desc:
Send a monkey towards the largest group of enemies, causing a 2-hex radius explosion on impact. Enemies hit take @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, reduced by @FalloffPercent*100@% for each hex they are away from the epicenter. Wound and 1% Burn applied for @IgniteDuration@ seconds to all enemies hit.

Burn: Deal a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
ability.name: Misfit Toy
ability.description:
Send a monkey towards the largest group of enemies, causing a 2-hex radius explosion on impact. Enemies hit take 320 / 480 / 680 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, reduced by 30 / 30 / 25% for each hex they are away from the epicenter. Wound and 1% Burn applied for 5 seconds to all enemies hit.

Burn: Deal a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%

ability.desc: Stop attacking and brace for @TauntDuration@ seconds, gaining <TFTBonus>@ModifiedDefenses@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist. Empower the next attack to deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage, increased by <physicalDamage>@ModifiedBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage for each 1 or 2 cost champion on your team.
ability.name: Hound of the Underground
ability.description: Stop attacking and brace for 2 seconds, gaining <TFTBonus>? (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist. Empower the next attack to deal <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage, increased by <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage for each 1 or 2 cost champion on your team.

ability.desc: Lob bombs at the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies, Stunning them for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds and dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to each. Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>.
ability.name: Sumpsnipe Surprise
ability.description: Lob bombs at the nearest 3 enemies, Stunning them for <scaleLevel>1</scaleLevel> seconds and dealing <magicDamage>110 / 165 / 265 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to each. Heal <scaleHealth>210 / 240 / 285 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>.

ability.desc:
For @DamageDuration@ seconds, gain @ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%) Durability and create a 2-hex cloud of noxious fumes that deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within. Afterwards, detonate the cloud and deal @ModifiedSecondDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies within.

Experiment Bonus: After dealing damage, deal @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_NunuCurrentExperimentBonus@% max %i:scaleHealth% bonus magic damage (@ExperimentICD@s cooldown).
ability.name: ZOMBIE POWER!!
ability.description:
For 3 seconds, gain 0.50 / 0.50 / 0.55 (%i:scaleAP%) Durability and create a 2-hex cloud of noxious fumes that deals 30 / 45 / 65 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within. Afterwards, detonate the cloud and deal 150 / 225 / 340 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies within.

Experiment Bonus: After dealing damage, deal ?% max %i:scaleHealth% bonus magic damage (1s cooldown).

ability.desc:
Jinx alternates between Zap, Flame Chompers, and Death Rocket for her ability.

Zap: Deal @ZapModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies in a line and Stun them for @ZapStunDuration@ seconds.
Flame Chompers: Deal @FlameChompersModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to @NumOfFlameChompers@ 1-hex circles of enemies.
Death Rocket: Fire a rocket at the center of the board that @DeathRocketModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to ALL enemies, reduced by @FalloffPercent*100@% for each hex they are away from the epicenter.
ability.name: Ruin Everything
ability.description:
Jinx alternates between Zap, Flame Chompers, and Death Rocket for her ability.

Zap: Deal ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies in a line and Stun them for 1 / 1 / 10 seconds.
Flame Chompers: Deal ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to 3 1-hex circles of enemies.
Death Rocket: Fire a rocket at the center of the board that ? (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to ALL enemies, reduced by 10% for each hex they are away from the epicenter.

ability.desc: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Every @NumOfAttacks@rd attack is replaced with a spark that deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to target and <physicalDamage>@SecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to @NumOfBounces@ nearby enemies.
ability.name: Living Battery
ability.description: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Every 3rd attack is replaced with a spark that deals <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to target and <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to 2 nearby enemies.

ability.desc: Jab target @NumStrikes@ times for <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage each. Then uppercut them, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and briefly knocking them up.
ability.name: 1-2-3 Combo
ability.description: Jab target 2 times for <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage each. Then uppercut them, dealing <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and briefly knocking them up.

ability.desc: Launch a wave at target that bounces @NumBounces@ times to enemies within @SearchRange@ hexes and deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Ocean's Ebb
ability.description: Launch a wave at target that bounces 3 times to enemies within 3 hexes and deals <magicDamage>120 / 180 / 290 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.desc:
Lock onto target and strafe to a nearby position, unleashing @BaseMissiles@ missiles split between the target and all enemies within two hexes. Each missile deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and reduces Armor by @FlatArmorShred@.

Every @SpecialMissileNum@th missile deals @ModifiedSpecialDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and reduces Armor by @SpecialMissileArmorReduction@.
ability.name: Broadside Barrage
ability.description:
Lock onto target and strafe to a nearby position, unleashing 21 / 21 / 35 missiles split between the target and all enemies within two hexes. Each missile deals ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and reduces Armor by 1.

Every 7th missile deals ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage and reduces Armor by ?.

ability.desc:
Passive: After dealing damage, heal @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%).

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Slam a massive sword on target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to them and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes.
ability.name: Demacian Justice
ability.description:
Passive: After dealing damage, heal ? (%i:scaleHealth%).

Active: Gain ? (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Slam a massive sword on target, dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to them and ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to target and create a one-hex radius zone of darkness around them. After a brief delay, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies still in the zone.
ability.name: Looming Darkness
ability.description: Deal <magicDamage>220 / 330 / 500 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to target and create a one-hex radius zone of darkness around them. After a brief delay, deal <magicDamage>110 / 165 / 250 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies still in the zone.

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds, attacks also cause adjacent enemies to bleed for <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage over @BleedDuration@ second.
ability.name: Overdrive Blades
ability.description: For 6 seconds, attacks also cause adjacent enemies to bleed for <physicalDamage>15 / 25 / 40 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage over 1 second.

ability.desc: Spin, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to adjacent enemies and healing <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>. Apply a <physicalDamage>@ModifiedBleedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage bleed to target over @BleedDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Decimate
ability.description: Spin, dealing <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to adjacent enemies and healing <scaleHealth>150 / 175 / 200 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>. Apply a <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage bleed to target over 4 seconds.

ability.desc: Enter a defensive stance and gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield that rapidly decays over @ShieldDuration@ seconds. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedBaseStrikeDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage + <magicDamage>@PercentShieldDamage*100@%</magicDamage> of the damage absorbed to enemies around and in front of Irelia.
ability.name: Defiant Dance
ability.description: Enter a defensive stance and gain <TFTBonus>? (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield that rapidly decays over 3 seconds. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>? (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage + <magicDamage>30%</magicDamage> of the damage absorbed to enemies around and in front of Irelia.

ability.desc:
Ambessa switches between two stances on cast:

Chains: Gain +1 Range. Attacks deal @ModifiedChainDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
On cast, dash to target and strike in a half-circle, dealing @ModifiedStrikeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies hit.

Fists: Gain @ModifiedOmnivamp@ (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp and attack twice as fast.
On cast, briefly Stun target before slamming them into the ground, dealing @ModifiedSlamDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage, then dash away.
ability.name: Unrelenting Huntress
ability.description:
Ambessa switches between two stances on cast:

Chains: Gain +1 Range. Attacks deal ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
On cast, dash to target and strike in a half-circle, dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies hit.

Fists: Gain ? (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp and attack twice as fast.
On cast, briefly Stun target before slamming them into the ground, dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage, then dash away.

ability.desc:
Send vines towards the current target, Stunning them for @StunDuration@ second and dealing @ModifiedTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Then smaller vines seek out the @NumSmallerVines@ nearest enemies and deal @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them.

Experiment Bonus: Ability damage bleeds enemies for @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_ZyraCurrentExperimentBonus@% bonus true damage over @ExperimentDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Grasping Roots
ability.description:
Send vines towards the current target, Stunning them for 1 second and dealing 260 / 390 / 585 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Then smaller vines seek out the 2 nearest enemies and deal 80 / 120 / 180 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them.

Experiment Bonus: Ability damage bleeds enemies for ?% bonus true damage over 2 seconds.

ability.desc: Cleanse all negative effects and heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>. Slash, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies in a line. If only one enemy is hit, the damage is doubled.
ability.name: Harvest from Flames
ability.description: Cleanse all negative effects and heal <scaleHealth>100 / 125 / 150 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>. Slash, dealing <physicalDamage>? (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies in a line. If only one enemy is hit, the damage is doubled.

ability.desc: Fortify for @Duration@ seconds, gaining <TFTBonus>@ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Durability. Afterwards, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Eclipse
ability.description: Fortify for 3 seconds, gaining <TFTBonus>? (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Durability. Afterwards, deal <magicDamage>115 / 175 / 270 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Active: Gain @AttackSpeed*100@% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat. After every @RangeIncreaseNumAttacks@ casts, gain +1 Range.
ability.name: Upgrading Barrage Module
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks deal ? (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Active: Gain 25% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat. After every 3 casts, gain +1 Range.

ability.desc:
Throw 3 cards at different targets.

Blue Card: Restore @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health to the lowest Health ally.
Red Card: Deal @ModifiedRedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the largest circle of enemies.
Yellow Card: Deal @ModifiedYellowDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to target and Stun them for @StunDuration@ second.
ability.name: Wild Cards
ability.description:
Throw 3 cards at different targets.

Blue Card: Restore ? (%i:scaleAP%) Health to the lowest Health ally.
Red Card: Deal 110 / 165 / 255 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the largest circle of enemies.
Yellow Card: Deal 210 / 315 / 505 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to target and Stun them for 1 second.

ability.desc: Grant <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield to the lowest current Health ally. Lux's next attack deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Prismatic Barrier
ability.description: Grant <TFTBonus>160 / 180 / 240 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield to the lowest current Health ally. Lux's next attack deals <magicDamage>360 / 540 / 900 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.

ability.desc:
Briefly gain @DR*100@% Durability and summon a massive claw, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the most enemies in a line. The @NearestEnemies@ closest enemies take @DamageBonus*100@% more damage and are pulled towards Mordekaiser.

For the next @EmpowerDuration@ seconds, gain @OmnivampPercent*100@% Omnivamp, +1 Attack Range, and replace every attack with a slam that deals @ModifiedTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to target and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all other enemies within @AttackHexRadius@ hexes.
ability.name: Grasp of the Iron Revenant
ability.description:
Briefly gain 40% Durability and summon a massive claw, dealing 160 / 240 / 800 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the most enemies in a line. The 4 closest enemies take 25% more damage and are pulled towards Mordekaiser.

For the next 10 seconds, gain 30% Omnivamp, +1 Attack Range, and replace every attack with a slam that deals 330 / 500 / 3000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to target and ? (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all other enemies within 2 hexes.

ability.desc: Curse the nearest non-cursed enemy, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over @Duration@ seconds and reducing the effectiveness of shields used on them by @ShieldReavePercent*100@%.
ability.name: Tormented Soul
ability.description: Curse the nearest non-cursed enemy, dealing <magicDamage>500 / 750 / 1150 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over 10 seconds and reducing the effectiveness of shields used on them by 50%.

ability.desc:
Fire a cannonball at target, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. If they die, the cannonball ricochets to the nearest enemy, dealing the overkill damage. When it does, permanently gain @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_TristanaASPerStack@% Attack Damage.

(Current Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_TristanaASGain@% %i:scaleAD%)
ability.name: Draw a Bead
ability.description:
Fire a cannonball at target, dealing ? (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. If they die, the cannonball ricochets to the nearest enemy, dealing the overkill damage. When it does, permanently gain ?% Attack Damage.

(Current Bonus: ?% %i:scaleAD%)

ability.desc: Heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and ascend for @Duration@ seconds. While ascended, heal <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHealPerSecond@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies every second. On takedown, the ascension's duration is extended by @BonusDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Demonic Ascension
ability.description: Heal <scaleHealth>250 / 300 / 350 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and ascend for 6 seconds. While ascended, heal <scaleHealth>75 / 90 / 110 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> and deal <magicDamage>? (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies every second. On takedown, the ascension's duration is extended by 2 seconds.

ability.desc:
Fire an explosive charge, dealing @ModifiedPrimaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to target and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to adjacent enemies. 20% Sunder all enemies hit for @Duration@ seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

Experiment Bonus: On Combat Start and after Ability casts, dash to the target, then gain @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_UrgotCurrentExperimentBonusShield@% max Health Shield and @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_UrgotCurrentExperimentBonusAS@% Attack Speed for @ExperimentDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Corrosive Charge
ability.description:
Fire an explosive charge, dealing 3 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to target and 1 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to adjacent enemies. 20% Sunder all enemies hit for 6 seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

Experiment Bonus: On Combat Start and after Ability casts, dash to the target, then gain ?% max Health Shield and ?% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

ability.desc: Launch a star at target that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. It bounces to the farthest enemy within @HexLimiter@ hexes, then bounces back to the target. This effect repeats @NumRepeats@ times, hitting a different enemy each time.
ability.name: Paddle Star!
ability.description: Launch a star at target that deals <magicDamage>140 / 210 / 450 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage. It bounces to the farthest enemy within 4 hexes, then bounces back to the target. This effect repeats 2 / 2 / 4 times, hitting a different enemy each time.
